segments.text: Hi Bill , I saw your grandma yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was running around the track at my college and there she was walking around the same track .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Grannie always tries to stay fit and healthy.She is always making us kids eat the proper foods .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it pays off for her.How old is she anyway ?
segments.speaker: S1
